selectedVerses.text: Have you not put a hedge around him and his house and all that he has, on every side? You have blessed the work of his hands, and his possessions have increased in the land.
The way of a sluggard is like a hedge of thorns, but the path of the upright is a level highway.
And now I will tell you what I will do to my vineyard. I will remove its hedge, and it shall be devoured; I will break down its wall, and it shall be trampled down.
Therefore I will hedge up her way with thorns, and I will build a wall against her, so that she cannot find her paths.
The best of them is like a brier, the most upright of them a thorn hedge. The day of your watchmen, of your punishment, has come; now their confusion is at hand.
